conversations.english: Is Jack still staying idle everyday?
conversations.chinese: 杰克还是整天无所事事吗？
conversations.reply_english: No, he has mended his way. After his father died, he set his hand to the job of putting his business affairs in order.
conversations.reply_chinese: 不，他现在改过自新了。自从他的父亲死后，他着手整顿他的生意，使他的生意走上了正规。

conversations.english: I couldn’t believe you should crack such a joke to them.
conversations.chinese: 我无法相信你跟他们竟然开这样的玩笑。
conversations.reply_english: What was wrong?
conversations.reply_chinese: 有什么不对吗？

conversations.english: Both Bob and carl will become somebody in the future.Don't you think so?
conversations.chinese: 鲍伯和卡尔将来都了不得，你看呢？
conversations.reply_english: Yeah.But Bob's talent can't to be named on the same day with Carl's.
conversations.reply_chinese: 不错,但是鲍伯的才智可无法与卡尔同日而语

conversations.english: You're going go Dresden for sightseeing?
conversations.chinese: 你要去德莱斯观光吗?
conversations.reply_english: Yeah.And I'm going by bus.
conversations.reply_chinese: 不错.我要坐公共汽车去.

title: 你喜欢城市生活还是乡村生活

conversations.english: What kind of life do you perfer,city life or country life?
conversations.chinese: 你是喜欢农村生活还是城市生活？
conversations.reply_english: In comparison to city life,the country life is quiet and peaceful.
conversations.reply_chinese: 与城市生活相比，乡下较为宁静。

conversations.english: Maria sings like a lark,doesn't she?
conversations.chinese: 玛丽娅的歌儿美极了。
conversations.reply_english: Yes,she's almost equal to Celine Dion when she sings.
conversations.reply_chinese: 是啊，差不多都比得上席琳.迪翁。

title: 弗雷德是个全面发展的学生

conversations.english: I hear Fred is a very good student in your class.
conversations.chinese: 听说弗雷德是你们班上非常优秀的学生。
conversations.reply_english: Though he's not the one who can get the highest score,yet,on the whole,he is comparable to the best.
conversations.reply_chinese: 尽管他不是得最高成绩的人，但是总体来看他却可以和班上最好的媲美。

title: 我的洋装看起来怎么样

conversations.english: Nice dress. How do I look? Be honest.
conversations.chinese: 这件洋装很好看！说老实话，我看起来怎么样？
conversations.reply_english: Hmm… you look too dressed up. How about this purple top and these jeans?
conversations.reply_chinese: 恩，你看起来穿得太正式了，你觉得紫色上衣配牛仔裤怎么样？

conversations.english: Yesterday I read hamlet.such a fantastic book!
conversations.chinese: 昨天我读了《王子复仇记》.真是本好书.
conversations.reply_english: You said it.No one can match Shakespeare in artistic talent.
conversations.reply_chinese: 你说对了,就艺术才能而言没人能与莎士比亚相比.

title: 你比你表弟看起来成熟

conversations.english: Mike,you're seventeen years old,right?
conversations.chinese: 迈克，你已经17岁了吧？
conversations.reply_english: Yeah,Why?
conversations.reply_chinese: 是的，怎么啦？

title: 红宝石和金刚石的价格

conversations.english: Have you any idea of the prices of ruby and diamond?
conversations.chinese: 你知道红宝石和金刚石的价格吗？
conversations.reply_english: I'm not very sure.but I know ruby is less valuable than diamond.
conversations.reply_chinese: 不太了解.但是我认为金刚石要比红宝石贵重.

conversations.english: I’m betting the New York Yankees win. How about you?
conversations.chinese: 我赌纽约洋基队会赢，你呢？
conversations.reply_english: Well, I’m in favor of the Red Sox. They’ve had a good season.
conversations.reply_chinese: 恩，我支持红袜队。红袜队这一拳一直表现得很抢眼……

conversations.english: So, are you enjoying the performance so far?
conversations.chinese: 哎,到目前为止你喜欢这场演出吗?
conversations.reply_english: Well, the costumes and the set are marvellous, but the acting is a bit stiff. What do you think?
conversations.reply_chinese: 恩,服装和布景都很棒.但是演得有点儿呆板.你觉得呢?

conversations.english: Did you know that abortion is still illegal in many states in the USA?
conversations.chinese: 你知道吗,在美国很多州堕胎是违法的.
conversations.reply_english: Why? I thought Americans were supposed to be more open than that.
conversations.reply_chinese: 怎么会?我以为美国人在这方面是很开放的.

title: 鲍勃可不是八年前的那个年轻人

conversations.english: Bob returned from Japan last week. You know that?
conversations.chinese: 鲍伯上周从日本回来了。知道吗？
conversations.reply_english: Yeah.I met him yesterday.He's no longer the same young man as he was eight years ago.
conversations.reply_chinese: 知道，我昨天遇到了他。他可不是八年前的那个年轻人了。

conversations.english: Do you like travelling?
conversations.chinese: 你喜欢旅游吗？
conversations.reply_english: Yes,I do.
conversations.reply_chinese: 是的。

title: 财富不等同于幸福快乐

conversations.english: If one is rich,is the happy?
conversations.chinese: 一个人有钱就幸福吗？
conversations.reply_english: I don't think so.It's impossible to equate wealth and happiness.
conversations.reply_chinese: 我不这样认为.不可能把财富和幸福划等号。

title: 凯文和他妻子有点问题

conversations.english: I heard that Kevin got divorced. Is that true?
conversations.chinese: 我听说凯文离婚了，真的吗？
conversations.reply_english: Not so bad,but Kevin does have problems with his wife.
conversations.reply_chinese: 没这么糟糕，不过凯文确实和他妻子有点问题。

conversations.english: what do you think about the public service advertisement for quiting smoking?
conversations.chinese: 你觉得那个号召戒烟的公益广告怎么样?
conversations.reply_english: while I think it's great that they're trying to get people to quit smoking, but I don't really care for the advertisement.
conversations.reply_chinese: 我觉得劝导别人戒烟是好的,不过我真的不喜欢那个广告.

conversations.english: How do you usually get to school?
conversations.chinese: 你一般怎么去学校?
conversations.reply_english: I usually ride my bike. Which form of transport do you prefer to use?
conversations.reply_chinese: 我一般都骑自行车去.你喜欢哪种交通工具?

conversations.english: Julie, what's on the tube?
conversations.chinese: 朱莉,电视上演什么?
conversations.reply_english: Nothing but bunch of commercials. These days the amount of commercials is amazing.
conversations.reply_chinese: 没什么,全是广告.最近广告的数量多得惊人.

title: 你对什么商品的品牌偏好

conversations.english: How do you feel about wearing name logos or slogans on your clothing?
conversations.chinese: 你觉得穿着一件有品牌名称或者广告语的衣服感觉如何?
conversations.reply_english: I've never really thought about it before. I guess it doesn't bother me.
conversations.reply_chinese: 我以前从来没想过这个问题.我觉得无所谓.

conversations.english: Oh, man. I had the best supper last night. My wife made a stir-fry and it was amazing!
conversations.chinese: 兄弟，我昨晚吃的炒青菜是最棒的。
conversations.reply_english: I love stir fry crispy bitesized vegetables covered in a mixture of soy sauce and oyster sauce. Wilted greens and fresh bean sprouts. Throw in some onion and garlic and ginger! Mmm! Mmm! It’s almost lunchtime. I would die for a plate of stir fry right now!
conversations.reply_chinese: 我喜欢那种脆的一口就能吃掉的菜，上面盖满酱汁和耗油。枯萎的绿色配上新鲜的豆芽，再加上些洋葱，蒜和姜。现在快到吃午饭的时间了，我真想马上来一盘这样的炒菜。

title: 你们想建造什么样的理想家园

conversations.english: Mr. and Mrs. Robinson! Let’s get straight to it. You have saved up your money for years and are now ready to build your dream home. What did you have in mind?
conversations.chinese: 罗宾逊夫妇，我们直接来谈主题吧。这些年你们已经存了很多钱，现在你们已经准备好建造理想家园。你们有什么打算？
conversations.reply_english: A suburban bungalow straight out of the sixties! A perfect lawn with minimal landscaping. A brick patio in the backyard with an old-fashioned grill, quaint lawn furniture, and a swimming pool. A two-car carport, pastel siding and a gable roof. Completed with white shutters and a white picket fence !
conversations.reply_chinese: 要盖一个60年代那样的平房。有一块能欣赏到全景的漂亮草坪，后院要有一个砖砌的露台，旧式的烤架，古雅的细麻纹家具，还要有一个游泳池。 能容纳2辆车的车棚，有着粉蜡笔墙板和三角墙屋顶。还要有一个白色的百叶窗，和白色的尖桩篱栅。

conversations.english: What kind of gas does this car take?
conversations.chinese: 这辆车加什么油？
conversations.reply_english: I don't know. It's a rental.
conversations.reply_chinese: 这是租来的。

conversations.english: I never understand why these shops have so much liquor.
conversations.chinese: 我从来不了解为什么这些店有这么多种类的酒。
conversations.reply_english: What do you mean? It's because it's much cheaper to buy liquor duty-free.
conversations.reply_chinese: 什么意思？因为买免税的酒便宜很多。

conversations.english: I heard you were teaching English over there.Tell me about it. Did you like it?
conversations.chinese: 听说你在那里教英文。说说看，你喜欢吗？
conversations.reply_english: Oh, yes, it was very interesting.
conversations.reply_chinese: 是的，非常有意思。

conversations.english: We have to pick up Conrad before the party.
conversations.chinese: 我们在派对开始前要去接康瑞德。
conversations.reply_english: Alright, no problem.
conversations.reply_chinese: 好的，没问题。

title: 在艺术展览馆欣赏作品

conversations.english: Wow! I can’t believe I’m standing here!
conversations.chinese: 哇，我简直不能相信我站着这儿。
conversations.reply_english: What are you so excited about?
conversations.reply_chinese: 你怎么如此兴奋。

conversations.english: Wow, American football is more exciting than I thought.
conversations.chinese: 哇，美式足球可比我想象的刺激多了。
conversations.reply_english: You’re in America now, my British friend. We just call it football.
conversations.reply_chinese: 我的英国朋友，你现在可是在美国，我们叫它橄榄球。

conversations.english: Who do you think will win the championship?
conversations.chinese: 你认为谁能赢得冠军？
conversations.reply_english: I really can't say. Both teams this year seem really good.
conversations.reply_chinese: 我说不好。今年两个队看来都不错。

title: 你觉得我的新衬衫怎么样

conversations.english: Hey, look at my new shirt. What do you think about it?
conversations.chinese: 嘿，看我的新衬衫，怎么样？
conversations.reply_english: Just so-so. Where did you get it?
conversations.reply_chinese: 一般。从哪儿买的？

title: 克隆羊是科学上的一大跃进

conversations.english: Do you know that scientists replicated a sheep into an identical clone.
conversations.chinese: 你知道吗，科学家复制了一头一模一样的克隆羊。
conversations.reply_english: I heard about that. It was successful.
conversations.reply_chinese: 我听说过，很成功。

conversations.english: Do you think Mr. Johnson is a good worker?
conversations.chinese: 你认为约翰逊先生是个好员工吗？
conversations.reply_english: Just between you and me, I think he's lazy.
conversations.reply_chinese: 别告诉别人哦，我觉得他很懒。

title: 你确定你听见的是正确的吗

conversations.english: Are you sure you heard right?
conversations.chinese: 你确定你听见的是正确的吗？
conversations.reply_english: Yes, he is running for class president.
conversations.reply_chinese: 是的，他要竞选班长。

title: 他们还真的很可能赢这场比赛

conversations.english: Our team just scored a goal.
conversations.chinese: 我们队刚进了一个球。
conversations.reply_english: That's more like it.
conversations.reply_chinese: 这还差不多。

title: 昨晚的球赛西班牙晋级了

conversations.english: Hi, Mark, did you catch the game last night?
conversations.chinese: 嘿，Mark。你有看昨晚的球赛吗？
conversations.reply_english: No, I was out. Was it worth watching?
conversations.reply_chinese: 没有，我不在家。我有错过什么精彩的吗？

conversations.english: Hi, Ben. Here are the top ten of this week's top chart.
conversations.chinese: 嘿，本。这是本周前十的排行榜。
conversations.reply_english: Oh, great!
conversations.reply_chinese: 噢，太棒了！

title: 她的衣服看起来很滑稽

conversations.english: Her dress looks funny.
conversations.chinese: 她的衣服看起来很滑稽。
conversations.reply_english: I wouldn't say that. It looks fine to me.
conversations.reply_chinese: 我不这样认为。在我看来挺好的。

conversations.english: Do you know anyone who’s had plastic surgery?
conversations.chinese: 你知道谁整过容吗？
conversations.reply_english: You mean like a breast enlargement? I don't think that's really necessary. That's not the way a woman should stay attractive.
conversations.reply_chinese: 你是指丰胸手术这样的吗？我觉得真的没必要。女人不应该靠这种方法来保持魅力。

conversations.english: What newspaper are you reading?
conversations.chinese: 你正在看什么报纸？
conversations.reply_english: New York Times. I read it everyday.
conversations.reply_chinese: 纽约时报。我每天都看。

title: 我喜欢卡尔跑步的样子

conversations.english: Hey, look! They’re playing reruns of the 1996 Olympics.
conversations.chinese: 嘿，你看！他们在回放一九九六年的奥运。
conversations.reply_english: Isn’t that Michael Johnson? I think he set a world record in this race.
conversations.reply_chinese: 那不是迈克尔?约翰逊？我记得他在这场比赛中创下了世界纪录。

conversations.english: I never watch foreign films. They're too boring.
conversations.chinese: 我从不看外语片。那些电影太无聊了。
conversations.reply_english: Jason, you have no taste. You think First Blood is a good movie.
conversations.reply_chinese: 杰森，你没品味。你还觉得《第一滴血》是好片呢。

conversations.english: Lucy, what are your priorities when buying a car?
conversations.chinese: 露西，当你买车的时候，你优先考虑的时候什么？
conversations.reply_english: I guess the first thing is the price, the second is the size, and of course the color will play a role too. But I have to be honest. It is our today’s responsibility to take care about our environment. Therefore, I will also pay attention to the fuel consumption of the car. You know, the rise in gasoline prices is huge. So I would rather to consider a smaller car with smaller engine. For which I can also save some tax. Last of the list, I also consider the safety.
conversations.reply_chinese: 我想我首先考虑的是价格，然后是大小，当然，颜色也重要。但是我必须诚实。保护环境是现代人的责任。因此，我也会注意汽车能源的消耗量。你知道的，油价上涨很快。所以我宁愿要考虑买一辆更小的车，有更小马力的引擎。因为我还可以省下一些税费。最后，我也会考虑安全性。

title: 我过去认为旧网页也不错

conversations.english: The new webpage design is much more effective than before. I feel confident it will rope in a lot more business because of its user-friendly format.
conversations.chinese: 新的网页设计比以前的效果更好了.由于该网页采用使用方便的板式,我有信心它能够揽来更多的生意.
conversations.reply_english: Why do you think the new page is so much better than the old page? I thought the old page wasn't half bad....
conversations.reply_chinese: 为什么你认为新网页比旧网页要好得多?我过去认为旧网页也不错...

title: 你觉得这部电影怎么样

conversations.english: So what did you think about the movie?
conversations.chinese: 那你觉得这部电影怎样？
conversations.reply_english: Well, I think this Star Wars episode is an excellent piece of work, but not as good as the previous ones.
conversations.reply_chinese: 嗯，我觉得这一部《星球大战》是很好的一部作品，但是没之前那些那么好。

title: 想了解些关于黑客的事情

conversations.english: Hey, Mike. You've been surfing the Net for quite a while. What on earth are you searching for?
conversations.chinese: 嘿，麦克。上网已经好一会儿了。你究竟在找什么？
conversations.reply_english: It's something relative hackers. I often hear people talking about them, but I don't know much about them.
conversations.reply_chinese: 关于黑客的东西。我经常听大家谈论黑客。但是我对他们了解不多。

title: 运动员药检没半点意义

conversations.english: Michael Johnson doesn’t look graceful, but he sure is powerful.
conversations.chinese: 迈克尔?约翰逊看起来是不优雅，不过他爆发力十足。
conversations.reply_english: If I were on as many steroids as he was, I think I’d be powerful, too.
conversations.reply_chinese: 若我使用跟他一样多的类固醇，我想我也会很有爆发力的。

conversations.english: Who got ripped off?
conversations.chinese: 她的钱被骗啦？？
conversations.reply_english: Big time! A hacker broke into the company's files and got all her personal information. You really think it's completely safe?
conversations.reply_chinese: 不只呢！有个黑客侵入了网络公司的计算机档案，取得她全部的个人数据。你真的觉得这种交易方式十分安全吗？

conversations.english: What's wrong? You don't like ancient Egypt?
conversations.chinese: 怎么了？难道你不喜欢古埃及？
conversations.reply_english: Actually, I don't like history. Lately, these shows are always about the Pyramids.
conversations.reply_chinese: 事实上，我不喜欢历史。而且最近这类节目全部都和金字塔有关。

title: 这衣服穿在我身上好看吗

conversations.english: How do I look in this new dress?
conversations.chinese: 这衣服穿在我身上好看吗？
conversations.reply_english: You’d better change it. It’s ugly.
conversations.reply_chinese: 你最好换掉它，太丑了

title: 怎么利用网站来促进销售

conversations.english: What's the news on our website? How effective do you think it is from a marketing standpoint?
conversations.chinese: 我们网站上有什么新闻?从销售的角度来看,你认为怎么有成效?
conversations.reply_english: We've been able to survey and track some of the information of our website users through some cookie technology, and it's surprising to see the results.
conversations.reply_chinese: 一直以来我们能够利用小条信息技术调查和追踪一些网站使用者的信息,令人惊讶的是我们看到了成效.

conversations.english: Do you hear what happened to Sally?
conversations.chinese: 你听说莎利出什么事了吗？
conversations.reply_english: No, what?
conversations.reply_chinese: 没有，什么事？

conversations.english: What do you know about Julia Roberts?
conversations.chinese: 你对朱莉娅·罗伯兹了解多少？
conversations.reply_english: Her acting is OK.
conversations.reply_chinese: 她的演技还行。

title: 我不是太喜欢卓别林的电影

conversations.english: How do you like other films starring Charlie Chaplin?
conversations.chinese: 你觉得查理·卓别林主演的其他电影怎么样。
conversations.reply_english: Well,I like others very much,but I really don't think much of this one.
conversations.reply_chinese: 我嘛，我喜欢其他的电影，但是真的不怎么喜欢这一部。

conversations.english: Did you enjoy the movie?
conversations.chinese: 你喜欢这部电影吗?
conversations.reply_english: Oh,it's really a drag.
conversations.reply_chinese: 哎呀，太单调乏味了。

title: 我不喜欢电影的男主角

conversations.english: I've had enough of that!
conversations.chinese: 我受够了！
conversations.reply_english: Why ,this is the most interesting film!
conversations.reply_chinese: 为什么，这部电影很有意思嘛！

title: 你觉得时装表演怎么样

conversations.english: What channel did you watch last night?
conversations.chinese: 你昨晚看哪个频道了？
conversations.reply_english: Channel 24.It shows some cable networks and no commercial interruptions.
conversations.reply_chinese: 二十四频道，它是有线频道，没有广告干扰。

title: 你觉得昨晚的电视剧怎么样

conversations.english: What do you think of the play showed last night?
conversations.chinese: 你觉得昨晚的电视剧怎么样？
conversations.reply_english: I think there's too much violence and it did no good to my little boy.
conversations.reply_chinese: 我学得暴力镜头太多了，对我的小孩不好。

conversations.english: Did you watch the live telecast of the World Cup last night?
conversations.chinese: 昨晚你看世界杯实况赛了吗？
conversations.reply_english: I missed it.I watch a live show of a concert.
conversations.reply_chinese: 没，我错过了，我看了一个音乐会实况。

conversations.english: Many people say it's a good story.But I think it's boring!
conversations.chinese: 许多人都说那本小说不错,可是我觉得很无聊.
conversations.reply_english: I don't think I share your view there.The writer is writing about history, society, human nature and so on.It's too hard to understand.
conversations.reply_chinese: 我不大同意你的观点.作者写的历史、社会、人性等,理解起来是很难的.

title: 我喜欢的也正是这个人物

conversations.english: Whose part do you think is best played?
conversations.chinese: 你认为哪个角色演得最好？
conversations.reply_english: That of the old man.
conversations.reply_chinese: 那位老人。

conversations.english: What do you think of that situation comedies showed every weekend?
conversations.chinese: 你觉得每周末的情景喜剧怎么样？
conversations.reply_english: To tell you the truth,I don't think much of them.
conversations.reply_chinese: 老实说我觉得不怎么样。

title: 我认为这部电影不怎么样

conversations.english: I don't think much of the film.
conversations.chinese: 我认为电影不怎么样.
conversations.reply_english: But I think it wasn't too bad.
conversations.reply_chinese: 我觉得不错.

conversations.english: Titanic made a hit! It was so touching.
conversations.chinese: 泰坦尼克号很成功!太动人了.
conversations.reply_english: But I see things rather differently.The heroin is not attractive and her acting is just so-so.
conversations.reply_chinese: 但是我有不同看法.女主角并不吸引人,她的演技也一般.

conversations.english: It's not good for business recently.
conversations.chinese: 最近生意不大好做.
conversations.reply_english: Not good for business? I don't see eye to eye with you.The new policy offers new opportunities.
conversations.reply_chinese: 不好做?我可不这样认为.新政策提供了新机遇.

title: 我可不认为日语容易学

conversations.english: Japanese is easy to learn.
conversations.chinese: 日语容易学.
conversations.reply_english: You're mistaken about it. As a matter of fact, it's very hard.
conversations.reply_chinese: 不对,事实上很难很难.

title: 琼斯和马克相比怎么样

conversations.english: How do Mark and Jones compare,in your opinion?
conversations.chinese: 在你看来，和琼斯相比马克怎么样？
conversations.reply_english: Generally speaking,Mark's personality is much more agreeable than Jones
conversations.reply_chinese: 总的看来，我认为马克比琼斯性格更让人喜欢。

conversations.english: Which is more interesting to you,flying kites or going roller-skating?
conversations.chinese: 你觉得放风筝和滑旱冰哪个更有趣？
conversations.reply_english: Well,flyling kites is more fun to me.
conversations.reply_chinese: 对我来说，放风筝更有趣。

conversations.english: Hey, Mike. Can I ask you something?
conversations.chinese: 嗨，Mike，我可以问你个问题吗？
conversations.reply_english: Sure, what's up?
conversations.reply_chinese: 当然，什么事？

title: 你对逛街买东西有何看法

conversations.english: What do you think of shopping?
conversations.chinese: 你对逛街买东西有何看法？
conversations.reply_english: I don't mind shopping for food and other daily needs.
conversations.reply_chinese: 我不反对逛街买食品和其它日用品。

title: 想去电影院看吸血鬼电影吗

conversations.english: You want to go to the movies tonight?
conversations.chinese: 晚上想去看电影吗？
conversations.reply_english: Sure! What' s playing?
conversations.reply_chinese: 当然！什么电影？

conversations.english: Wow, that terrible movie is finally over. Next time I’m picking the film, because I don’t want to end up seeing a chick flick.
conversations.chinese: 那部糟糕的电影终于结束了，下次我选电影，因为我不想看一个肥皂剧。
conversations.reply_english: Well you should have picked, in the end you always complain about everything.
conversations.reply_chinese: 你本应该选电影的，结果你总是抱怨一切事情。

conversations.english: So, how'd everyone do?
conversations.chinese: 唉，大家有什么收获吗﹖
conversations.reply_english: Well, there's this clock I was... MY vintage clock! How do you have my clock??
conversations.reply_chinese: 呃，那个钟……我的古董钟！你怎么会有我的钟﹖﹖

title: 和网上认识的女孩约会

conversations.english: Do you want to hang out tomorrow?
conversations.chinese: 明天要不要出去玩儿？
conversations.reply_english: Oh, I can't. I have a date!
conversations.reply_chinese: 不行，我有约会。

title: 城市变迁找不到烤鸭店了

conversations.english: Excuse me. Where is Q-Duck? I remember it was around the second intersection of this street.
conversations.chinese: 对不起，请问Q-DUCK 在哪儿？我记得它就在这条街第二个十字路口。
conversations.reply_english: Q-Duck? Do you mean the famous roast-duck store?
conversations.reply_chinese: 你指那家著名的烤鸭店吗？

title: 我被地铁艺术吸引住了

conversations.english: What's your little caper? Come home so late! We are all worried about you.
conversations.chinese: 你搞什么鬼？回来这么晚，我们都为你担心呢。
conversations.reply_english: Oh, I am terribly sorry. But I was so captivated with the singer at the subway exit. So I forgot the time.
conversations.reply_chinese: 很抱歉。我被地铁站出口处的歌手吸引住了，所以忘记了时间。

title: 根除老人们的陈旧观念

conversations.english: It is difficult for old people to do away with old ideas.
conversations.chinese: 要老人们根除他们的观念是很难的。
conversations.reply_english: So the reform can not be carried out well.
conversations.reply_chinese: 所以改革进行得不顺利。

title: 他在说成功人士的秘诀

conversations.english: What did he say?
conversations.chinese: 他说什么呢？
conversations.reply_english: He said he would tell us the secret of becoming a successful man.
conversations.reply_chinese: 他说会告诉我们成为成功人士的秘诀。

conversations.english: You should have seen the T.V. show that was on last night, the topic it covered was really interesting, animal rights.
conversations.chinese: 你应该看看昨晚的电视秀，它包含的话题很有意思：动物权力。
conversations.reply_english: Do you really believe in that? If they are going to focus on something, they should do it on civil rights.
conversations.reply_chinese: 你真的相信那个吗？如果他们应该关注点东西，他们应该关注公民权力。

title: 这个小镇存在很多严重问题

conversations.english: This small town has many serious problems.
conversations.chinese: 这个小镇存在很多严重的问题。
conversations.reply_english: What's the cause?
conversations.reply_chinese: 什么原因呢？

title: 当革命者是需要勇气的

conversations.english: To be a revolutionary needs great courage!
conversations.chinese: 要当革命者需要有勇气呀。
conversations.reply_english: He must be courageous enough to fly in the face of established authorities.
conversations.reply_chinese: 他得勇敢向权威挑战。

conversations.english: Hey, look at these paintings on the wall! Aren’t they beautiful? Linda bought some good paintings.
conversations.chinese: 喂，看墙上这些画！它们难道不漂亮吗？琳达买的油画真不错。
conversations.reply_english: Yeah, very impressive. Oh, this one’s marvelous!
conversations.reply_chinese: 是啊，很令人钦佩。噢，这幅画很了不起哦!

conversations.english: You know, I don’t quite understand the Chinese criterion of beauty. I mean, I asked some Chinese guys who had seen my girlfriend. I asked them, Isn’t she beautiful? They were looking at me with eyes wide open, like …and they even wondered how in the world I could ever have fallen in love with her!
conversations.chinese: 你知道吗，我真不明白中国人的审美标准。我是说，我问过几个看到过我女朋友的中国男人。我问他们，她难道不漂亮吗？他们看着我，眼睛睁得圆圆的，像……而且他们还想知道我怎么会竟然爱上了她！
conversations.reply_english: I understand. I’ve heard quite a few people say that most Chinese women that foreigners have chosen are not pretty at all. I know I’m one of those that they were describing. I’m surely not beautiful.
conversations.reply_chinese: 我明白。我已听好几个人说过大部分外国人选择的中国女人一点都不漂亮。我知道我就是他们所说的其中之一。我是无疑不漂亮的。

title: 我收到了传销性质的邮件

conversations.english: Hey, look at the offer I got in my e-mail. It says that I can get rich quickly while working at home!
conversations.chinese: 嘿，看我电子信箱里别人寄过来的邮件。上面说我在家工作也能快速致富。
conversations.reply_english: Do you also believe in Santa Claus and the Tooth Fairy?
conversations.reply_chinese: 你也相信圣诞老人和牙齿仙女？
